content: संकेतः {@--1@} An intimation, allusion. {@--2@} A sign, gesture, hint; <ls>Mu. 1.</ls> {@--3@} An indicatory sign, mark, token. {@--4@} Agreement, convention; संकेतो गृह्यते जातौ गुणद्रव्यक्रियासु च <ls>S. D. 12.</ls> {@--5@} Engagement, appointment, assignation (made by a mistress or lover); नामसमेतं कृतसंकेतं वादयते मृदु वेणुं <ls>Gīt. 5.</ls> {@--6@} A place of meeting (for lovers), rendezvous; कांतार्थिनी तु या याति संकेतं साभिसारिका <ls>Ak.</ls> {@--7@} Condition, provision. {@--8@} A short explanatory rule (in <ab>gram.</ab>).
